snippet.title: Goblin Summer Camp - Lazy announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Join the discord - https://discord.gg/vwWRPev

Goblin Summer Camp is a low stakes mini-game based, large group action game. You run around and cause havoc as a group of young goblins at their first summer camp. Playing group activities like tag, red rover, and capture the flag - gaining power ups and getting to upgrade your goblin as you survive. Players that last the longest in each mini-game end up becoming extremely powerful. But like all things in goblin life, they are temporary and only last for one game.

Goblin Summer Camp is currently in active development to help flush out the full features of the game. However the pre-alpha version of the game is available, and we look forward to seeing many goblins running around to help test out the gameplay and levels of fun. If you would like to know more about Goblin Summer Camp, or just stay informed about updates, lore, and other free content please consider joining our mailing list  and discord :D
